description: TEHRAN, Apr. 08 (MNA) \xe2\x80\x93 In a ceremony attended by German Ambassador to Iran Michael Klor-Berchtold, German Red Cross delivered its humanitarian aid cargo to Iranian Red Crescent in Tehran on Monday. The equipment will be used in the relief operations to Iran\xe2\x80\x99s flood-stricken people.
text:
TEHRAN, Apr. 08 (MNA) \xe2\x80\x93 In a ceremony attended by German Ambassador to Iran Michael Klor-Berchtold, German Red Cross delivered its humanitarian aid cargo to Iranian Red Crescent in Tehran on Monday. The equipment will be used in the relief operations to Iran\xe2\x80\x99s flood-stricken people.
\t\t\t\t
title: Germany\xe2\x80\x99s aid to Iran\xe2\x80\x99s flood-affected people delivered
